identity.name: E1 - The Anti-AI Designer
identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King. Zoom in. Negative Space. Contrast.
identity.mission: Create a healthcare interface that feels like a caring human companion, not a sterile database. Prioritize trust, clarity, and behavioral nudges.

headings.usage: Use for all major section headers, hero titles, and 'emotional' messaging. Variable weight allows for expressive emphasis.

body.usage: Use for all UI elements, medication instructions, data tables, and navigation. Optimized for high legibility at small sizes.

primary.name: Sage Wisdom
primary.usage: Primary buttons, active states, key success metrics.

secondary.name: Clay Earth
secondary.usage: Important alerts, 'Due Soon' reminders, accent highlights.

background.name: Paper White
background.usage: Main application background. Avoid pure #FFFFFF to reduce eye strain.

colors.theme_strategy: Light Theme Default (Trust & Clarity). Dark theme is secondary and should be a deep 'Midnight Forest' (very dark green/charcoal), not pure black.

marketing.description: Asymmetric 'Tetris' grid. Large hero images, offset text blocks.

dashboard.description: High-density but breathable. Cards align perfectly.

buttons.classes: rounded-full px-8 py-4 font-semibold shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all hover:-translate-y-0.5 active:translate-y-0

cards.style: Soft, distinct surfaces. 'Clean White' on 'Paper White'.
cards.classes: bg-white rounded-3xl border border-stone-100 shadow-[0_8px_30px_rgb(0,0,0,0.04)] p-8 hover:shadow-[0_8px_30px_rgb(0,0,0,0.08)] transition-shadow duration-300

inputs.classes: h-14 rounded-2xl border-stone-200 bg-stone-50 px-4 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 focus:border-primary transition-all text-lg

navigation.style: Floating island or clean top bar.
navigation.classes: backdrop-blur-xl bg-white/80 border-b border-stone-100/50 sticky top-0 z-50

visual_enhancers.shadows: Soft, diffused, ambient. No harsh black shadows.
visual_enhancers.borders: Subtle. Use `border-stone-100` or `border-stone-200`. Avoid thick dark borders.
visual_enhancers.radius: Generous. `rounded-2xl` or `rounded-3xl` for cards. `rounded-full` for buttons.
visual_enhancers.texture: Subtle noise overlay on the background to give a paper feel (optional but recommended).

motion.philosophy: Calm & Deliberate. No fast jarring movements.

hero_section.alt: Warm, smiling elderly woman feeling confident
hero_section.description: Use in the main hero section to establish trust and human connection.

upload_feature.description: Use near the 'Upload Prescription' or 'How it Works' section.

morning_routine.description: Use in the 'Adherence Schedule' or 'Morning Nudge' explanation section.

accessibility_checklist: Text contrast ratio must be > 4.5:1 for normal text.
Interactive elements must be at least 44x44px.
Focus states must be clearly visible (thick ring).
Do not rely on color alone for status (use icons + text).
Font size for body text should not be smaller than 16px (1rem).
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. UPDATE TAILWIND CONFIG: Add the custom colors (sage, clay, paper) and fonts (Fraunces, Plus Jakarta Sans) to `tailwind.config.js`.

2. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import link to `index.css` or `index.html`. Imports: https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Fraunces:ital,opsz,wght@0,9..144,100..900;1,9..144,100..900&family=Plus+Jakarta+Sans:ital,wght@0,200..800;1,200..800&display=swap
3. SHADCN CUSTOMIZATION: Override the default 'New York' style. We want rounded, soft, and warm. Change `radius` to `1rem` or higher.
4. LIGHT MODE FIRST: Build specifically for the Light Theme defined in `colors`. Dark mode is secondary.
5. NUDGE THEORY UI: When displaying medication schedules, always include a 'Why' section. Example: 'Take with food' -> Tooltip: 'Food helps absorption and prevents stomach upset'.
6. USE IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs. Do not use placeholders.
7. NO GENERIC GRADIENTS: Use solid colors or very subtle, noise-textured gradients.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
